Performance:
February 1982: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil

Production: February 1982

Play: The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (女殺油地獄)

– Click image to view.

Scenes:

The Riverbank at Tokuan (徳庵堤茶店 / Tokuan tsutsumi)

The House of Kawachiya (河内屋内 / Kawachiya uchi)

The Oil Store Teshimaya (豊島屋油店 / Teshimaya aburamise)

The Memorial Service (豊島屋逮夜 / Teshimaya taiya)

Characters:

Okichi (Nyōbō Okichi / 女房お吉)

Okiyo (Anemusume Okiyo / 姉娘お清)

Tea stall proprietor (Chamise no teishu / 茶店の亭主)

Yohei (Kawachiya Yohei / 河内屋与兵衛)

Yagoro (Hakeno Yagorō / 刷毛の弥五郎)

Zembei (Kaishu no Zenbei / 皆朱の善兵衛)

Kogiku (Tennōjiya Kogiku / 天王寺屋小菊)

Brothel Supervisor (Tennōjiya kasha / 天王寺屋花車)

Millionaire escort to Kogiku (Aizuno daijin Rōku / 会津の大尽蝋九)

Moriemon (Yamamoto Moriemon / 山本森右衛門)

Hachiya (Oguri Hachiya / 小栗八弥)

Shichizaemon (Teshimaya Shichizaemon / 豊島屋七左衛門)

Pilgrimage leader (Sanjokō Sendatsu / 山上講先達)

Tokubei (Kawachiya Tokubei / 河内屋徳兵衛)

Osawa (Tokubei nyōbō Osawa / 徳兵衛女房お沢)

Tahei (Kawachiya Tahei / 河内屋太兵衛)

Priest (Inari Hōin / 稲荷法印)

Okachi (Imōto Okachi / 妹おかち)

Kohei (Wataya Kohei / 綿屋小兵衛)

Gorokuro (Chōgamiya Gorokurō / 帳紙屋五郎九郎)

Okichi's second daughter (Nakamusume / 中娘)

Head of police unit (Torite gashira / 捕手頭)

Maid (Gejo / 下女)

Buddhist devotees (Kōjū / 講中)

Members of religionist group (Dōgyōshū / 同行衆)

Policemen (Torite / 捕手)
